mapper.select: SELECT T1.DECD_SN , T1.DECD_SQ , T1.DECD_STTS_DCD , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE 1=1 AND CMNS_CD_GRP = 'D006' AND CD_VL_ID = T1.DECD_STTS_DCD ) AS DECD_STTS_NM , T1.DCFC_ENO , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE 1=1 AND EMPNO = T1.DCFC_ENO ) AS DCFC_ENM , T1.DECD_DTM , T1.DCFC_ANNO_CNTN , T1.RJCT_YN , T1.RJCT_RSN_CNTN FROM IBIMS232B T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DECD_SN = #{decdSn}
